-Description:

This is a Beautiful Breton companion that has a lot of good spells and other attributes...
uhh yea..

Made her just a little shorter then normal, smarter, has all kinds of spells, heals when injured and really nice too look at.
_____________
-Location

Located in Roriksteads frostfruit inn
author: teetywc21
